title: South Korea's president declares martial law
content:
State crisis in South Korea: President Yoon surprisingly declared martial law and sent soldiers to parliament. This rejected martial law - even the representatives of the presidential party. South Korea's head of state Yoon Suk Yeol has declared martial law in the midst of a dispute over the national budget.
He announced this in a surprise televised speech.
